Purpose: Finite State Machine (FSM) library. You can think of XState as the "glue" that connects all the other parts of **Bluebot**.

Framework for building [GitHub Apps](https://docs.github.com/en/apps/creating-github-apps/about-creating-github-apps/about-creating-github-apps). Think of Probot as a NodeJS wrapper around Octokit that provides simpler Webhooks and config utilities.
Official wrapper around the GitHub REST API. You likely won't import from Octokit directly *(except for type definitions)*, as Probot will provide Octokit instances via context.
Make queries and actions against the GitHub API. Again, likely won't use this library directly, but the API reference is still good to use.
